name: Two Worlds (itch) (rameshmanne)
description:
Theme: Two Views

Every one has a dark side deep inside but very few can observe it.

Did you know that there was a dark side to jolly old Santa Claus? 

 Santa is the one who gives out gifts to children that have been good, but what about the children that have been bad? Those who have been naughty get the pleasure (or displeasure) of meeting one of the following dark and somewhat evil sidekicks of the jolly man in red.

How to Play?
ARRROW keys to move
SPACE to jump
LSHIFT to switch world
